content: <color=#8AAB4B>Glenn</color> is waiting for you to claim the <color=#8AAB4B>tent</color>. There are different kinds of tents, and he had considered every scenario when he picked them from Loomi Co.

content: Someone once asked me, "Why make a small peddler a trainee coordinator?" Hohoho, well, this probably answers it.
